name: It's Your World Now!
description:
This is a roguelike 3D pixel art platformer where you rebuild reality in your vision!
Collect chunks or reality and assemble them in your own unique way!

You can find the design document HERE!

I recommend downloading as the browser version may be extra buggy. Didn't have time to play test it as I barely had time to play test the Windows download.

unfortunately due to my day job getting super busy, getting sick for an entire day, and a technical issue; the game is no more than a simple tech demo.
Since it's a jam game I don't think this is the worst outcome!
Let me know what you think about it!

I didn't have time to put in the best controls so here's an extra breakdown if needed:
Confirm/Build: Space/Enter/South Controller Button
Jump: Space/South Controller Button
Move Character and Land: WASD/Joystick/D-Pad
Raise/Lower Land: Z+X/R2+L2
Rotate Land: Q+E/R1+L1
